revised_title: Studies on Synapsis: Parallel Conjugation and the Prophase Complex in Periplaneta
tldr: The author investigates the meiotic phase and synapsis in the insect Periplaneta, focusing on the premeiotic telophase and its relation to earlier events of synapsis. The study also includes observations on the genesis of spindle bivalents in spermatogenesis and the first account of synaptic events in oogenesis in the same form.
